availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William P. Brumback (Grant County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Brumback. Father of Richard H., Nancy J, Zerilda, Elizabeth Ann, Julia, Susan, Ellen, Mary Brumback. Farmer in Boone County, Kentucky in 1850. Employed George Beard as a farmer in Boone County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Grant County, Kentucky in 1860. Charged for an unpaid bond of $500 in Grant Circuit Court in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone, District 2 p. 183B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant, p. 958.
